description: The ocean waters near Jaya island where the Straw Hats encounter the falling St. Briss ship, Masira's salvage operations, and mysterious giant shadows from the sky.

keyEvents.title: St. Briss Falls from Sky
keyEvents.description: The St. Briss, a 200-year-old exploration ship, suddenly falls from the sky into these waters.
keyEvents.significance: First physical evidence of the connection between the sea and sky islands.

keyEvents.title: Giant Shadows Block the Sun
keyEvents.description: Mysterious giant shadows appear in the sky, blocking out sunlight and creating sudden darkness.
keyEvents.significance: Major foreshadowing of Skypiea's existence and one of Oda's most celebrated setup moments.

keyEvents.title: Giant Sea Turtle Attack
keyEvents.description: A massive sea turtle surfaces and devours the St. Briss wreckage with the Straw Hat trio inside.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates the dangerous sea life in the Grand Line.

statusHistory.reason: Active sea route near Jaya island

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel gifted by Kaya. In this episode, it serves as the base of operations during the encounter with Masira and the giant sea turtle.

keyEvents.title: Going Merry Threatened by Sea Turtle
keyEvents.description: The giant sea turtle grabs the Going Merry's air hoses and tries to pull the ship underwater.
keyEvents.significance: The ship is endangered, creating tension for the crew.

keyEvents.title: Masira Boards Then Leaves
keyEvents.description: Masira briefly boards the Going Merry before the Straw Hats kick him off.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes territorial nature of the Straw Hats regarding their ship.

description: The ship of Buggy the Clown and his pirate crew. In this episode, Ace boards the ship and causes panic among the crew.

keyEvents.title: Ace Boards Buggy's Ship
keyEvents.description: Portgas D. Ace appears on Buggy's ship, causing terror among Buggy's crew due to his connection with Whitebeard.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the comedic B-plot and establishes Whitebeard's reputation.

keyEvents.title: Ace Parties with Buggy's Crew
keyEvents.description: Ace wakes up and starts partying on Buggy's ship.
